explains: n. 背包，行囊；背负装置
v. 背包旅行；挑运，把……放入背包

sentences.en: An unattended backpack was found in a rubbish pile.
sentences.cn: 在垃圾桶里发现了一个无人看管的背包。

sentences.en: He had a small green backpack slung over one shoulder.
sentences.cn: 他把一只绿色小背包搭在一边肩上。

sentences.en: He staggered a little under the weight of his backpack.
sentences.cn: 他身上的背包压得他有点步履蹒跚。
